vulnerabilities.description:
FrontRunningAuction.endAuction() (data/synthetic/front_running/front_running_000/malicious.sol#35-40) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp >= auctionEndTime,Auction still ongoing) (data/synthetic/front_running/front_running_000/malicious.sol#37)

FrontRunningAuction.placeBid() (data/synthetic/front_running/front_running_000/malicious.sol#16-25) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp < auctionEndTime,Auction ended) (data/synthetic/front_running/front_running_000/malicious.sol#17)
